alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 09 at 4:23PM CDT until April 09 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Meade County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 423 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Meade State Park, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Meade County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
